message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
A slight adjustment to 7-3, let's see if you'll take it!
Still a bit too skewed towards you, Bob!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
Getting closer, but I want a bit more. Your turn again!
Still not enough, Bob! I'm not giving up yet!
Getting closer to the final stretch, Bob!
Let's make a deal, Alice! 50-50 split, the final stretch!
Alright, Bob, you've worn me down! 50-50 it is!
